DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study design intervention increase hepatitis B ( HBV ) screening among Korean Americans . The investigator design culturally specific intervention ( educational session ) test effect intervention 1200 Korean Americans . All subject interview intervention/control session 6 month session assess HBV screening level two group . Self-reported HBV screening verify review subject ' medical record . The primary study hypothesis intervention group high rate HBV serologic test follow-up compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Hepatitis B Screening Among Korean Church Attendees
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study design intervention increase hepatitis B ( HBV ) screening among Korean Americans . The investigator design culturally specific intervention ; educational small group discussion lead trained Korean leader . The effect intervention test 1200 Korean Americans . Subjects recruited Korean church invite join one-hour discussion health issue member church . One half subject participate intervention group . These subject discuss HBV receive resource relate HBV obtain screening . The half subject participate control group . These subject discuss nutrition physical activity receive resource relate topic , relate HBV obtain screening . All subject interview session 6 month session assess HBV screening level two group . Self-reported HBV screening verify review subject ' medical record . The primary study hypothesis intervention group high rate HBV serologic test follow-up compare control group . Secondary hypothesis : The intervention group high level knowledge hepatitis B liver cancer follow-up compare control group . The effect intervention hepatitis B serologic test mediate knowledge hepatitis B liver cancer .
DOC.criteria: Korean ancestry Have previously receive HBV screen know result previous HBV screen test No history liver cancer liver disease Current resident Los Angeles area Younger 18 year age Older 64 year age Not Korean ancestry Previously screen HBV History liver disease liver cancer Not current resident Los Angeles area
